entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near noon then light this afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers and ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
